Title: Triple Point
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Hallie Lambert (staff writer)
Actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
Plot: The search for Prax's daughter comes to a head; Admiral Souther's men plan for mutiny aboard the Thomas Prince.
